= Release 2.0 =
== new data types ==
 * new core record type Publication allows to share publication metadata with link to full body text
 * new core record type Site allows to share hierarchical site definitions incl polygon based shapes

= GBIF registry interaction (as soon as registry is stable) =
   * Issues relating to this section are tagged with "Registry"
   * The GBIF registry (a component of the GBRDS) is under active development
   * The registry will allows for managing the extensions including the tagging of extensions (e.g. gisin.org:Invasive extensions)
   * The IPT must support the outcomes of the extension registration and tagging work
 * simplified registry interaction:
   * organisation registration only done externally (not in ipt admin UI)
   * write resource tags (= metadata keywords) to registry
